channel.title: ?!? ~~invisible~~ ?!?
channel.description:
I was just wondering how you become invisible in your server.
Other people are doing it. I can see their name either, all I see is a dot :S
Anyone know? :S

item.title: ?!? ~~invisible~~ ?!?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

add this is your commands

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOU NAME HERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

change the YOUR NAME HERE though
or search for

if (command.startsWith("pnpc")

and make sure u have it and use the command ::pnpc 3064

it is the lesser demon champion. In most servers it makes u invisable

Read full topic
